docs.snippet: Ford Motor Co is expanding the use of Amazon.com Inc's Alexa personal assistant in its vehicles to allow drivers to talk to their cars - demanding anything from a nearby cheeseburger to a weather forecast - marking a leap by the Detroit automaker ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ford Motor Co is expanding the use of Amazon.com Inc's Alexa personal assistant in its vehicles to allow drivers to talk to their cars - demanding anything from a nearby cheeseburger to a weather forecast - marking a leap by the Detroit automaker to incorporate a technology initially targeted for home use.

headline.main: Ford Expands Alexa Use, Heating Up Auto Personal Assistant Battle
headline.print_headline: Ford Expands Alexa Use, Heating Up Auto Personal Assistant Battle
